categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Richard Bremmer (born January 27, 1953) is an English actor who portrays a First Order officer in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. He is notable for being the first actor to portray the villain Lord Voldemort in the 2001 film Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, in a flashback sequence where the character arrived at the home of the titular character's parents to kill them.
